app.name: Agent Satisfaction App
app.help:
How would you rate this customer?
Use ASAT (agent satisfaction) to rate your customers, analyze the data, and build business rules around them.
Click a star to choose your rating, it will be added as a custom field, and see the agent average for this customer
But there's more! Build out a view of your lowest rated customers or create business rules around them. The options are endless!
